items.sentence: He was transferred to the head office in Tokyo.
He will leave Tokyo and come to Kansai in June.
The more time I spend here, the more I like it.
Don't forget to close the door on your way out.
I want you to promise me you won't do it again.
I sure hope Tom and Mary can take care of John.
I hope the police catch the guy who stabbed me.
I'm hoping to do a little fishing next weekend.
I tried to make myself understood, but in vain.
I found it difficult to make myself understood.
